about_the_game:
Collect allies and weapons in parallel worlds and defeat thousands of enemies.

Rescue to the Parallel Is A New Roguelike Game.


You can rescue characters in the field, and adventure together.

You can bring up to four companions with you, each of them will support you with their own unique skills.
The main character can set up to three weapons, each with unique attacks.

The combination of companions, weapons, and your route selection will extend your survival time infinitely.

Defeat enemies that keep coming at you, find friends and treasure chests, collect crystals, and challenge bosses over and over again.

Tips For Starting the Game


Allies will basically become allies once you rescue them, but you will need to meet them multiple times in different worlds to make strong and rare characters allies.

Weapons and status-up items obtained from treasure chests are permanently reflected, but super powerful buffs and super cheat weapons generated by collecting crystals are temporary.

Compatible With Mouse and Keyboard

About Live Streaming and Video Sharing Site

Please do live streaming on Youtube, Twitch, etc., and upload videos to video sharing site such as Youtube.

About updates

We are developing to increase the number of stages depending on the sales.

name: Rescue To The PARALLEL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIndows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: ntel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Collect allies and weapons in parallel worlds and defeat thousands of enemies. Rescue to the Parallel is a new roguelike game. Rescue characters to make friends, search for weapons and treasure chests. The route you choose extends your survival time infinitely.
